CustomField.description: Determines the scope for checking this capability's prerequisites. 'Current Turn Only' is stateless and requires the prerequisite to have been met in the same multi-step turn. 'Entire Session' is stateful and remembers if a prerequisite was met in any previous turn.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 'Current Turn Only': Prerequisite must have been run in the same multi-step turn. 'Entire Session': Remembers if a prerequisite was met in any previous turn in the conversation.
CustomField.label: Prerequisite Validation
